md:
giải nghĩa từ "spray" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Spray (noun) - Phun, xịt
	* Meaning: a stream of small particles or droplets of liquid, gas, or powder that are forced out of a container or device.
	* Example: The fireman used a spray to put out the fire.
	* Related words: spray bottle, spray can, spray paint

2. Spray (verb) - Phun, xịt
	* Meaning: to force a stream of small particles or droplets of liquid, gas, or powder out of a container or device.
	* Example: She sprayed the perfume on her wrist.
	* Related words: spray gun, spray nozzle, spray bottle

3. Spray (noun) - Lớp phủ, lớp xịt
	* Meaning: a thin layer of material that is applied to a surface by spraying.
	* Example: The car had a spray of wax to protect the paint.
	* Related words: spray coating, spray finish, spray paint

Note: The meanings of "spray" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.

  1. Spray (noun) - Phun, xịt

    • Example: The fireman used a spray to put out the fire.

  2. Spray (verb) - Phun, xịt

    • Meaning: to force a stream of small particles or droplets of liquid, gas, or powder out of a container or device.
    • Example: She sprayed the perfume on her wrist.
    • Related words: spray gun, spray nozzle, spray bottle

  3. Spray (noun) - Lớp phủ, lớp xịt

    • Meaning: a thin layer of material that is applied to a surface by spraying.
    • Example: The car had a spray of wax to protect the paint.
    • Related words: spray coating, spray finish, spray paint

Note: The meanings of "spray" can vary depending on the context in which it is used.
